name: Knight and Wizard
description:
WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left click - Ahoot

R - Reload

Right click or Q - Drop gun

G - Reset to last checkpoint (if stuck)

Play as the knight as he finds himself stuck in a cave he fell into. Lucky him, there's a cool looking wand in the room he fell into.

Shoot stuff, run around, do whatever (It's a top-down shooter). Your enemies will try to get you down by trying to impose rules on you; just shoot 'em. Shoot the chains to break the rules. Sometimes those you think are your greatest enemies aren't all that bad so just try to be nice. We're all a scared little kobold in a cool hat sometimes.

Made most stuff myself with Unity, Blender, Paint.net, Bfxr, Audacity. The pathfinding was Unity. Not my fault. So if the enemies are really jittery, blame it on Unity, not me. I think it's still my fault with the way I'm having pathing fighting with the physics.

Code if you want: https://github.com/TyLanger/RunnerWizard
